model.name: Session Overview Table - Complete PDCA Analysis with TRON Feedback and Build Tags
model.description: Create comprehensive overview table in PDCA CHECK section with dual links to all PDCAs, TRON quotes, previous decisions referenced, corresponding build tags, and summary statements for complete session analysis.
model.rationale: TRON requested comprehensive overview table to analyze complete session progress, decisions, and outcomes with proper traceability and summary assessment.
acceptance_criteria: Create overview table in PDCA CHECK section
Include dual links (GitHub + local) to all PDCAs
Include exact TRON quotes from each interaction
Include previous decisions that TRON referenced
Include corresponding build tags for each phase
Include summary statement from Claude for each PDCA
Cover both 2025-09-03 session and 2025-09-05 recovery session

technical_details.analysis_depth: Complete session progress and decision traceability

model.implementation_notes: This provides TRON with comprehensive session analysis and progress overview for decision making.
